info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 2 at 7:23PM MDT until June 2 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Denver CO
info.description:
TORBOU
The National Weather Service in Denver has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Logan County in northeastern Colorado...
* Until 745 PM MDT.
* At 723 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Pawnee Pass, or 15 miles west of Sterling, moving east at 15 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* Locations impacted include... Logan Corners, Pawnee Pass and Willard.
info.instruction: Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a well-built building away from windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 7:45 PM MDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 7:45 PM MDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 7:45 PM MDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 7:45 PM MDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
